titleStmt.title: SII 8.88: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 88. (A.R. No. 498 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīrājentiracoḻatevaṟku yāṇṭu 5vatu svasti . śrīmaṉumahāpratāṉaṉ maṇṭalikariyamarācaṉ ciṅkaṇataṇṇā
yakkaṉeṉ Uṭaiyār tiruvaṇṇāmalaiUṭaiya nāyaṉāṟkut tirumaṭaippaḷḷippuṟamāka Ammāṉ kampayataṇṇāyakkar tirumeṉikku naṉṟākak kaṇṭa cantikku
Amutupaṭi kaṟiamutu veñcaṉam cāttuppaṭi Uḷḷiṭṭaṉattukkum tiruvekampamuṭaiyāṉ tirumatiḷ tiruppaṇikku taccakkūlikkum Uṭalāka viṭṭa paṅkaḷanāṭṭuc ceyyāṟṟukku
teṉkaraippaṭṭavūrkaḷil makuḻampūṇṭi nāṟpālellaik kuḷppaṭṭa naṉcai puṉcai nilattil tevatāṉam paṭṭavirutti nikki nikkiniṉṟa nilamum Innilattāl vanta Āyam pāṭikāval taṟiI
ṟai taṭṭārppāṭṭam kuṟṟatteṇṭam paṭṭitteṇṭam veṭṭi taṉiyāḷ Erimiṉ poṉvari ceṭṭikaḷ vāṇikar maṉaiyiṟai māvaṭai maravaṭai maṟṟum Eppeṟpaṭṭa pala Āyaṅkaḷu muḷppaṭa
Uṭaiyār tiruvaṇṇāmalaiUṭaiya nāyaṉāṟkut tevatāṉaiṟaiyiliyāka viṭṭeṉ ciṅkaṇataṇṇāyakkaṉeṉ . Itu māṟuvāṉ keṅkaiiṭai kumariiṭai kurāṟpacuk koṉṟāṉ pāvaṅ koḷvāṉ ..
svastyastu . kaMpayacamūpatibhāgineyo goṣṭhāpagāharaṇa siṁhaṇadaṇḍanātha .. śrīśoṇaśailapataye bhuvi pṛthvikaṅkaM jitvā dadau vakuḷavallimakhaṇḍabhogaiḥ ..
śrīśoṇādripaterddatvā vakuḷākhyapuraM mahaT . vijitvā pṛthivīkaṅkaM jayastaMbhamivākaroT . Inta makuḻampūṇṭi cittiraimātattil tiruvasantaṉāṉa tiruvekampamuṭaiyāṉ tirunāḷuk kuṭalākavum viṭṭeṉ .
Digital edition of SII 8.88 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
